alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 4:46AM MST until January 02 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches near Riverton and Shoshoni. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches near Hudson and Lander. * WHERE...Wind River Basin and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...Until 11 AM Monday. The heaviest snow is expected this evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Winter travel conditions are likely, with slick roads and periods of low visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
